item.title: Seamstress (Level 6)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Librarian
item.description: Looked for change that introduce or remove a string with git log -S

item.title: Goldsmith (Level 6)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Apprentice Web Designer (Level 2)
item.description: Instantly browse your working repository in gitweb with git instaweb

item.title: Apprentice Web Designer (Level 1)
item.description: Instantly browse your working repository in gitweb with git instaweb

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 1)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Master Author (Level 9)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Chimney Sweeper (Level 4)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Master Product Manager (Level 8)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Cherry Picker
item.description: Used git cherry-pick to add a sha from another branch into the current branch.

item.title: Miller (Level 6)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 270 times with git add -p.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 8)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Master Banker (Level 7)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Apprentice Pilgrim (Level 1)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Butcher (Level 5)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Seamstress (Level 5)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Miller (Level 5)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 204 times with git add -p.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 7)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Blacksmith (Level 6)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Miller (Level 4)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 170 times with git add -p.
